com.hissain.jscipy.signal

Class Windows

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hissain.jscipy.signal.Windows

  • public class Windows
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of window functions.

    • Method Detail

      • hanning

        public static double[] hanning(int m)
        Returns a symmetric Hanning window of length M.
        Parameters:
        m - The length of the window.
        Returns:
        The Hanning window.

      • hanning

        public static double[] hanning(int m,
                               boolean symmetric)
        Returns a Hanning window of length M.
        Parameters:
        m - The length of the window.
        symmetric - If true, generates a symmetric window (for filter design). If false, generates a periodic window (for spectral analysis).
        Returns:
        The Hanning window.

                              double beta,

        Returns a Kaiser window of length M with shape parameter beta.

        beta - The shape parameter.
        symmetric - If true, generates a symmetric window (for filter design). If false, generates a periodic window (for spectral analysis).

        The Kaiser window.

      • get_window

        public static double[] get_window(java.lang.String window,
                                  int M)
        Get a window by name. Supported: boxcar, triangle, blackman, hamming, hanning, bartlett, flattop, parzen, bohman.
        Parameters:
        window - The window name (case insensitive).
        M - The length of the window.
        Returns:
        The window coefficients.
